name: data-provenance-pipeline
description: Extracts data source and provenance information from Elasticsearch based on validated taxonomy

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Output File Prefix
parameters.helpText: GCS or local path prefix for output files

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.label: Page Size
parameters.helpText: Number of records per Elasticsearch page

parameters.name: max_pages
parameters.label: Max Pages
parameters.helpText: Maximum number of pages to fetch

parameters.name: taxonomy_path
parameters.label: Validated Taxonomy Path
parameters.helpText: Path to validated taxonomy JSONL file

parameters.name: bq_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: Optional BigQuery table to write output (project:dataset.table)

parameters.name: bq_schema
parameters.label: BigQuery Schema Path
parameters.helpText: Optional GCS path to BigQuery schema JSON

parameters.name: temp_location
parameters.label: GCS Temp Location
parameters.helpText: GCS path for temporary files used in BigQuery I/O
